thread.title: Jason Aldean, Eric Church, Sam Hunt Lead Route 91 Harvest Festival
thread.title_full: Jason Aldean, Eric Church, Sam Hunt Lead Route 91 Harvest Festival

title: Jason Aldean, Eric Church, Sam Hunt Lead Route 91 Harvest Festival
text:
The stellar lineup for the fourth annual Route 91 Harvest Festival in Las Vegas has been announced, with Jason Aldean, Eric Church and Sam Hunt headlining the event at Las Vegas , September 29th through October 1st. Related Route 91 Harvest Festival 2016: 8 Best Things We Saw From Luke Bryan's high-energy set to Dan + Shay's duet with Boyz II Men 
With the Las Vegas Strip serving as a backdrop to the event, the festival has earned its nickname, the "neon sleepover." Among others joining the lineup this year are Lauren Alaina, Big & Rich, Lee Brice, Kane Brown, Brothers Osborne, Josh Abbott Band, Maren Morris, Jake Owen, Michael Ray, High Valley and Brett Young. 
Among the acts who performed at last year's Route 91 Harvest Festival were headliner Luke Bryan, who termed the unique location an "adult playground" and passed out free beer to the crowd, Dan + Shay, who were joined by Boyz II Men for the group's "I'll Make Love to You," and Brad Paisley, whose set included appearances from Tyler Farr and guitar goddess Lindsay Ell. Three-day passes will go on sale at Rt91Harvest.com on March 3rd, at 10 a.m. PT . Additional options will also be available, including the Neon Lounge and Sky Suite VIP Packages with various amenities from elevated viewing areas, wait service, massage therapy and more. More News
